typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true,
	format: 'delimited',
	container: 'outputblob',
	folderPath: 'bc6f661b-7bde-4694-b632-9c01e374d33c',
	fileName: 'data_9b7fb8f7-86cd-44a7-93ac-70131c08a8e5_c784840f-a478-47ab-82e8-494b3c034d97.txt',
	columnDelimiter: '\t',
	escapeChar: '\\',
	qutoChar: '\"',
	encodingName: 'WINDOWS-1251',
	columnNamesAsHeader: true) ~> sourceOfTxt
sourceOfTxt sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> sink1
